suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Monaco Editor Null Safety Patterns
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests to validate the null safety patterns implemented in monaco editor components. Tests should cover initialization scenarios, method calls with potential null references, and edge cases. Focus on SessionCard.svelte, MonacoWrapper.svelte, and DiffPreviewDrawer.svelte to ensure robust null handling.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure type safety and prevent runtime errors by validating null guard implementations

suggestedTasks.title: Document Monaco Editor Initialization and Null Safety Patterns
suggestedTasks.description: Create documentation explaining the null safety approach for monaco editor instances. Include code examples of the implemented patterns, guidelines for future component development, and rationale for the chosen null guard strategies. Target developers working with monaco editor integrations in the project.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve knowledge sharing and provide clear guidance for consistent null safety

patterns: Use optional chaining (?.) for nullable monaco editor references

Check editor initialization before method invocation
